1 #include "lib/uav_flocking_tracking.h"
2 
3 uav_flocking_tracking::uav_flocking_tracking(unsigned int target)
4 {
5  this->target.id = target;
6  flock = new uav_flocking();
7  NodeHandle nh;
8  int queue_size;
9  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
10  target_sub = nh.subscribe("target_update", queue_size, &uav_flocking_tracking::target_callback, this);
11 }
12 
13 uav_flocking_tracking::~uav_flocking_tracking ()
14 {
15  delete flock;
16 }
17 
18 behavior_state_t uav_flocking_tracking::step ()
19 {
20  // update position information
21  spinOnce();
22 
23  // target left the area
24  if (pos.out_of_bounds(target.pose.pose)) {
25  return STATE_SUCCEEDED;
26  }
27 
28  // target is still inside area
29  else {
30  // compute velocity for flocking of CPSs
31  geometry_msgs::Vector3 velocity = flock->tracking(target.pose.pose);
32 
33  // move with new velocity
34  vel.move(velocity);
35  }
36 
37  // return state to action server
38  return STATE_ACTIVE;
39 }
40 
41 void uav_flocking_tracking::target_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::TargetPositionEvent::ConstPtr& msg)
42 {
43  // update information for this target
44  if (target.id == msg->id)
45  target = *msg;
46 }
47 
48 void uav_flocking_tracking::stop ()
49 {
50  geometry_msgs::Vector3 velocity;
51  vel.move(velocity);
52 }
